Appetizers.Name: Fried Pickles
Appetizers.Discriptrion: Wavy cut sliced pickles, dipped in batter and fried to perfection, With a side of Blue Cheese dip.

Appetizers.Name: Garden Salad
Appetizers.Discriptrion: A delightfully light and delicious salad picked fresh from the garden.

Hot Sandwiches.Name: Cubano
Hot Sandwiches.Discriptrion: A salty and satisfying sandwich made with the pig.

Hot Sandwiches.Name: Philly Cheese Steak
Hot Sandwiches.Discriptrion: A delicious hot and steamy sandwich composed of chopped peppers, onions, steak and cheese.

Cold Sandwiches.Name: BLT
Cold Sandwiches.Discriptrion: Classics are sometimes best, simply bacon, lettuce, tomato and mayo.

Cold Sandwiches.Name: Grinder
Cold Sandwiches.Discriptrion: Wonderfully Italian all on one roll.

Desserts.Name: Lava Cake
Desserts.Discriptrion: Chocolate bundt cake overflowing with hot fudge.

Desserts.Name: Pazookie
Desserts.Discriptrion: A dinner plate sized Chocolate chip cookie, covered in scoops of ice cream and drizzled with caramel and chocolate sauce.

Drinks.Name: Mint Tea
Drinks.Discriptrion: Light and refreshing tea, searved hot or cold.

Drinks.Name: Lemonade
Drinks.Discriptrion: Fresh squeezed lemons with just enough sugar to take the bite off the sour.
